Hi all, I found a very resourceful and toned down site regarding Ninja @ http://www.wordiq.com/definition/Ninja<http://www.wordiq.com/definition/Ninja> . it both confirms, rebukes and adds to many threads in our list regarding the subject. Thought you'd like to know. I would love to hear If anybody here can challenge or dismiss the 'facts' written there. Take Care! Rami.
